entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
